title: Major Expansion Problem; Orange on Orange; Toga with a Pocket Square
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss an issue that Rece foresees with expansion coming to the College Football Playoff, if Syracuse could be frisky in Death Valley, the differences between playing at Oregon and Auburn, most likely to wear a toga on set and if they're adjusting their methods to making picks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece and Pete hash out an issue with CFP expansion. Plus, how different is it for Bo Nix playing at Oregon versus Auburn?
